properties.name: options
properties.value: {title: { text: 'Number of Cars Sold' },subtitle: { text: '(click a column for details)' },data: [{month: 'March',units: 25,brands: {BMW: 10,Toyota: 15}},{month: 'April',units: 27,brands: {Ford: 17,BMW: 10}},{month: 'May',units: 42,brands: {Nissan: 20,Toyota: 22}}],series: [{type: 'column',xKey: 'month',yKeys: ['units'],listeners: {nodeClick: function (event) {var datum = event.datum;window.alert('Cars sold in ' + datum[event.xKey] + ': ' + String(datum[event.yKey]) + '' + listUnitsSoldByBrand(datum['brands']));}}}],axes: [{type: 'category',position: 'bottom'},{type: 'number',position: 'left'}],legend: { enabled: false }}

globals: function listUnitsSoldByBrand(brands) {var result = '';for (var key in brands) {result += key + ': ' + brands[key] + '';}return result;}
